name: One More Day (Robert Hamra)
description:
One More Day is an immersive, captivating Twine game that revolves around the life of a depressed high schooler. Dive into the psychological effects of monotonous high school life; choose from various options to reflect on the fate of a mentally unstable high schooler.

Bringing awareness about a common but rarely talked about problem, the game shows how simple tasks can be impossible for someone struggling with mental health. Making choices that seem somewhat redundant, the gameplay reflects the life of a close friend who fights against this same problem that many others face today. Experience the tiring and taxing lifestyle of a dejected high school student.
